[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/commands/plugin.rb, line 435
435:     def options
436:       OptionParser.new do |o|
437:         o.set_summary_indent('  ')
438:         o.banner =    "Usage: #{@base_command.script_name} remove name [name]..."
439:         o.define_head "Remove plugins."
440:       end
441:     end
parse!(args)

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/commands/plugin.rb, line 443
443:     def parse!(args)
444:       options.parse!(args)
445:       if args.blank?
446:         puts options
447:         exit 1
448:       end
449:       root = @base_command.environment.root
450:       args.each do |name|
451:         ::Plugin.new(name).uninstall
452:       end
453:     end
